title: The Real 5G Winner Could Be China
text:
The technology industry is counting on fifth-generation wireless, or 5G, to be the next big growth driver for all kinds of new products, from phones and chips to software and sensors. But 5G remains an amorphous idea, and the short-term beneficiaries are no longer quite so clear.

The tech industry expects 5G to deliver speeds 10 to 40 times faster than current 4G LTE networks. Advocates expect its lower latency and data-rate capabilities to drive a new era of killer applications. But Wall Street analysts are suddenly questioning...
description: What’s the coming fifth-generation wireless technology good for? Plenty, say its proponents. But some Wall Street analysts aren’t so sure. Why Taiwan Semi might be the best play for U.S. investors.
